> -----Original Message-----
> From: mark_lybarger [mailto:mark_lybarger@...] 
> Sent: Friday, December 10, 2004 6:23 AM
> To: junit@yahoogroups.com
> Subject: [junit] junit test class location - with or without 
> source code.
> 
> i'm looking for arguments for and against keeping junit test 
> classes outside if the projects main source tree.

Same package in parallel source tree. Let's you test package access stuff.
Easy to not deliver any test code. You may end up with more than one test
tree if you get into higher level tests.

thanks
